description:
*In order to use the cards included in the DLC, purchase of the “Additional Card Pass" or “Additional Card Set Vol.1 [D-BT06]: Blazing Dragon Reborn” will be required. 
*It is not available to use or check cards included in this DLC unless you purchase “Additional Card Pass" or “Additional Card Set Vol.1 [D-BT06]: Blazing Dragon Reborn”.
*Even if you purchasied this DLC first, included cards can be unlocked by purchasing “Additional Card Pass" or “Additional Card Set Vol.1 [D-BT06]: Blazing Dragon Reborn”. 

This set includes 1 copy of each card in FFR or FR treatment. 
[INCLUDED]
・D-BT06/FFR01EN Chakrabarthi Phoenix Dragon, Nirvana Jheva
・D-BT06/FFR02EN Brilliant Equip, Bram Vairina
・D-BT06/FFR03EN Jeweled Sword Equip, Garou Vairina
・D-BT06/FFR04EN Diabolos Diver, Julian
・D-BT06/FFR05EN Merciless Count, Botis
・D-BT06/FFR06EN Direful Doll, Amandine
・D-BT06/FFR07EN Galactic B-Hero, Unite Dianos
・D-BT06/FFR08EN Combine Rusher
・D-BT06/FFR09EN Galactic B-Hero, Direct Foriel
・D-BT06/FFR10EN Youthberk "Skyfall Arms"
・D-BT06/FFR11EN Youthberk "RevolForm: Gust"
・D-BT06/FFR12EN Knight of Fracture, Schneizal
・D-BT06/FFR13EN Grand March of Full Bloom, Lianorn
・D-BT06/FFR14EN Performing Petal, Diantha
・D-BT06/FFR15EN Congratulatory Performance, Sucuse
・D-BT06/FR01EN Sturdy Wall Equip, Vils Vairina
・D-BT06/FR02EN Sealed Blaze Dragon, Shabda
・D-BT06/FR03EN Flash Equip Dragon, Bramahda
・D-BT06/FR04EN Sword Equip Dragon, Galondight
・D-BT06/FR05EN Wall Equip Dragon, Bilskil
・D-BT06/FR06EN Sparkle Rejector Dragon
・D-BT06/FR07EN Thoughts That Pierce Through
・D-BT06/FR08EN Term Fracture Dragon
・D-BT06/FR09EN Diabolos Girls, Ivanka
・D-BT06/FR10EN Desire Devil, Kuvisgee
・D-BT06/FR11EN Explosive Torcher
・D-BT06/FR12EN Diabolos Madonna, Shena
・D-BT06/FR13EN Desire Devil, Phamaan
・D-BT06/FR14EN Repelled Malice Dragon
・D-BT06/FR15EN Cardinal Dragon, Nuvorea
・D-BT06/FR16EN Aurora Battle Princess, Crumple Orchid
・D-BT06/FR17EN Galactic B-Hero, Rampart Aspida
・D-BT06/FR18EN Galactic B-Hero, Flatten Sufrey
・D-BT06/FR19EN Aurora Battle Princess, Detain Seekler
・D-BT06/FR20EN Cardinal Noid, Corofie
・D-BT06/FR21EN Planet Wall Dragon
・D-BT06/FR22EN Decisive Axe Dragon
・D-BT06/FR23EN Octaray Sorceress
・D-BT06/FR24EN Enucleate Angel
・D-BT06/FR25EN Knight of Tempestuousness, Vriede
・D-BT06/FR26EN Changing Magic, Memeruru
・D-BT06/FR27EN Palladium Zeal Dragon
・D-BT06/FR28EN Departure Towards the Dawn
・D-BT06/FR29EN Ensemble of Smiles, Amalie
・D-BT06/FR30EN Battle Siren, Theodosia
・D-BT06/FR31EN In the Dim Darkness, the Frozen Resentment
・D-BT06/FR32EN Spree Wasper
・D-BT06/FR33EN Marching Debut, Purete
・D-BT06/FR34EN Custodial Dragon
・D-BT06/FR35EN Spirits That Roam

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
name: Rare Card Set 10 [D-BT06]: Blazing Dragon Reborn
